definitions.definition: To teach (somebody) by giving a speech on a given topic.
examples: The professor lectured to two classes this morning.

definitions.definition: To preach , to berate , to scold .
examples: Emily's father lectured her about the importance of being home before midnight.

main_definition: ( ambitransitive ) To teach (somebody) by giving a speech on a given topic.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To preach , to berate , to scold .
